title.narrative: Supporting labour migrants and their families to mitigate the negative impacts of COVID-19 pandemic

description.narrative: Priority of the Action structures around the impact of COVID-19 pandemic and raising of the living standards of migrants and their families. Action will include direct, immediate and urgent assistance to vulnerable groups among Uzbek migrants families as well as long-term assistance in the form of training of makhalla counsellors on social assistance and enhancing the technical capacity of self-governing bodies enabling their assistance to unemployed returned labour migrants in the future.
